item.name: Sigma Guitars DME Dreadnought Natural Satin
item.description: The Sigma DME is already equipped with a solid spruce top in a dreadnought form which produces a warm, powerful bass with balanced mids and clear highs. The tuners guarantee tuning stability and the flat action delivers soft playability. With Sigma's own pickups with integrated tuners, this guitar is ready for the stage. What more do you want … and all of it is available at such a low price!
